const express = require('express'); const path = require('path'); const app = express(); const port = 3000; // Path to your 'dist' folder inside 'frontend2' const distFolder = path.join(__dirname, 'frontend2', 'dist'); // Serve static files (JS, CSS, etc.) from the 'dist' folder app.use(express.static(distFolder)); // Route to serve the index.html when accessing '/App.jsx' app.get('/App.jsx', (req, res) => { res.sendFile(path.join(distFolder, 'index.html')); }); // Fallback route (optional) to serve index.html for other routes, useful for SPAs (Single Page Apps) app.get('*', (req, res) => { res.sendFile(path.join(distFolder, 'index.html')); }); app.listen(port, () => { console.log(`Server is running on http://localhost:${port}`); });
